title: Can The Warriors Defend Ja? Harden Struggles
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss if Harden has officially started to regress, what the Mavs can do to get back into the series with the Suns’ historic shooting, if the Celtics can win it all with an all-time level defense and how the Warriors can defend Ja.

itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Is Harden Still A Max Level Player? How To Defend Ja Morant?
